text: Dangerous Years is a 1947 American drama movie directed by Arthur Pierson and starring Billy Halop, Scotty Beckett, Ann E. Todd, Richard Gaines, Jerome Cowan, Darryl Hickman, Marilyn Monroe. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Dangerous Years
